front.title: Recommendation for key derivation using pseudorandom functions (revised)

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: This Recommendation specifies techniques for the derivation of additional keying material from a secret key, either established through a key establishment scheme or shared through some other manner, using pseudorandom functions.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
